eLTER_getILTEREnvCharacts

Source: R/getILTEREnvCharacts.R
getILTEREnvCharacts.Rd

This function ...

getILTEREnvCharacts()

Value

The output of the function is a dataframe containing all the Environmental Characteristics of the all ILTER's sites.

Author

Alessandro Oggioni, phD (2020) <oggioni.a@irea.cnr.it>

Examples

listEnvCharacts <- getILTEREnvCharacts()
knitr::kable(listEnvCharacts[1:5, ])
